roleset.name: diminish loudness (of a sound)

example.name: passive with instrument
example.text: No one speaks, and the snaking of the ropes seems to make as much sound as [the bells themselves]-1, *trace*-1 muffled *trace*-1 by the ceiling.

example.name: agentive
example.text: John muffled his laughter at Mary's slipping on the ice.
example.arg: his laughter at Mary's slipping on the ice

roleset.note: Frames file for 'muffle' based on sentences in wsj. VN class subjugate-42.3.
